text:
Hey Everybody, we're about to go dog sledding,
it's really loud out here.
Dave are you ready?

Oh I am ready, more than ready, this is going
to be awesome!
Woo!

Our turn around point here is the Great Divide,
we've gone a little bit into BC, now back
to Alberta.
These are our lead dogs here.
Two step is the leader of the pack.
yeah!
You can see they love it.
We're riding.
We're dog sledding here.

And we're in Banff National Park, it's the
only place that you can go dog sledding in
all of Banff National Park.
It's fantastic.

We had a great time with KingMik Dog sledding
here in Banff Lake Louise.

Thank you so much Kylie, that was a great
time.

Thank you and thanks for all the dogs they
did such great work!
Thanks Snapper, Great dog.

You gotta do it when you come to Banff National
Park, it's fantastic!
